MarketingTool.io Score

All shares

Social Media Monitoring

This tool will allow you to specify a URL and it will tell you how many times it was shared on various social media sites like LinkedIn, Pinterest, Google+, Facebook, VK and more. There is a bulk URL importer so you can grab social media stats for multiple URLs in one go.

Social Media Engagement and Analytics

You can easily see how much social engagement you have. You can also see the total share of shares. When you click on any of the items and induvidually enable or disable them.

Single vs Multi URL

Wether you want to pull the social stats for a single URL or pull the stats for multiple URLs at once, you can do it using this tool.
